entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as saying 'Yes' and referring to Luna. He is also mentioned as leading a party of warlocks into the marquee.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as rushing up to Harry and greeting him. She is also described as wearing bright yellow robes with a sunflower in her hair.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being greeted by Luna and introducing himself as 'Barny'. He seems to be confused about his name.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the twins who taught gnomes swear words.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the twins who taught gnomes swear words.

entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is mentioned as being in conversation with an acquaintance. He is also described as Luna's father.

relationships.description: Ron led a party of warlocks into the marquee and Luna rushed up to greet Harry.
Luna greeted Harry when she rushed up to him.
Fred and George taught gnomes swear words.
